Label: plant structure amount
Text definition: A {quality} that inheres in a {whole plant} by virtue of the plant bearing 0 or more instances of some {plant structure}.

Label: plant structure present
Text definition: A {plant structure amount} in which the {whole plant} bears at least one instance of some {plant structure}.

Label: plant structure absent
Text definition: A {plant structure amount} in which the {whole plant} bears no instances of some {plant structure}.

Label: leaves present
Formal definition:
'leaf amount' THAT (
    ('lower count' SOME xsd:integer[>0]) AND
    ('lower percent' SOME xsd:float[>0])
)

Label: leaves absent
Formal definition:
'leaf amount' THAT (
    'lower count' VALUE 0 AND 'lower percent' VALUE 0 AND
    'upper count' VALUE 0 AND 'upper percent' VALUE 0
)

Label: expanding leaves present
Formal definition:

    ('lower count' SOME xsd:integer[>0]) AND
    ('lower percent' SOME xsd:float[>0])
)

Label: expanding leaves absent
Formal definition:
'expanding leaf amount' THAT (
    'lower count' VALUE 0 AND 'lower percent' VALUE 0 AND
    'upper count' VALUE 0 AND 'upper percent' VALUE 0
)
